dc_title_s: Africa : with all its states, kingdoms, republics, regions, islands, & ca., improved and inlarged from D'Anville's map; to which have been added a particular chart of the Gold Coast wherein are distinguished all the European forts and factories
dc_description_s: With descriptive text.; Insets: A particular chart of the Gold Cost. -- Azores or Western Islands.; Detached from T. Kitchin's General atlas? cf. Phillips, P.L. List of geographical atlases, no. 4295, 4300.|104 x 123 centimeters on 2 sheets each 54 x 128 centimeters|Scale [1:8,500,000]|General Map Collection
